mods.abstract: DETAINED in parish jail of St John the Baptist the following slaves, viz: CHARLES, american negro aged 30 years, measuring 5 feet 8 1/2 inches, dark complexion, speaks english only; three scars on the forehead, says that he belongs to Mr John Kennett of New Orleans PETER, american negro aged about 29 years, measuring 5 feet 2 inches speaks english only, dark complexion, round face, two teeth of the upper jaw rotten, thick lips; says he belongs to Mr. N. Anderson of N. Orleans; has escaped from his master about a year ago. WASHINGTON, american negro aged 37 years measuring 5 1/2 feet inches, speaks english only, slim and dark complexion; says that he belongs to Mr. W. Gilbert of Ascension about 8 miles above Donaldeonville. The owners of said slaves are requested to claim their property according to law N TREPAGNIER. Dty-Sheriff. St. John the Baptist, September 7th 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
